name: things3-mcp
description: MCP server for Things 3 task management integration
long_description:
# Things 3 MCP Server

A Model Context Protocol server that provides integration with the Things 3 task management application. Allows AI assistants to:

- Create tasks and to-dos
- Manage projects and areas
- Search and retrieve tasks
- Update task status and properties
- Work with Things 3's natural language processing

Requires Things 3 to be installed on macOS.
